name: weekstart
description: Library to get first day of week.

scripts.build-umd: microbundle build src/main.js src/full.js --output dist --format umd --strict --no-compress
scripts.build-umd-min: microbundle build src/main.js src/full.js --output dist/min --format umd --strict
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-commonjs && npm run build-esm && npm run build-umd-min
scripts.all: npm run check-all && npm run doc && npm run build
scripts.release: bump patch --commit --tag --all --push package.json package-lock.json bower.json component.json
scripts.release-minor: bump minor --commit --tag --all --push package.json package-lock.json bower.json component.json
scripts.release-major: bump major --commit --tag --all --push package.json package-lock.json bower.json component.json
